title: Club Med Partners With VAX VacationAccess
text:
Last updated: 07:00 PM ET, Mon August 03 2015 Club Med Partners With VAX VacationAccess Travel Agent | Club Med | Claudette Covey | August 03, 2015 
In order to help travel consultant more seamlessly sell its portfolio of 65 resorts, Club Med said it plans to distribute its product offerings through VAX VacationAccess, an agent-only marketing and booking website. 
The Club Med product line is expected to be available on VAX platform within the next several weeks. < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free!
